name: Gizmeon Technologies Pvt Ltd
description:
Gizmeon Technologies is a new Generation Technology Services company initiated by a team of experienced IT professionals in Bangalore, India.  Gizmeon have expertise in all three pillars of Digital world. Mobility, Big Data and Cloud Computing. Gizmeon Technologies is one of the few companies which realised the potential of Digital revolution quite early.
Gizmeon had delivered number of high quality and creative mobile applications for the customers across the globe since 2009. Our professional team of programmers, project managers, and technology consultants provide Advanced Mobile Application Development and Industry specific mobility solutions.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 4A2, BCG Towers Opposite Special Economic Zone , Kakkanad , Seaport Airport Road,
